column4: I've a question for anyone intimiatly familiar with Debian packaging, anyone here fit that?
are you guys addicted to new version and updates/upgrades as much as me?

When editing a control file (dh_make) I'm aware you can use pipes to specify multiple packages ot meet the dependancy, but is it pissible to specify both an & as well as a | in a single entry? I'm packaging something that requires a working php install on Apache, but php4 or 5 work, AND apache and apache2
